column4: anyone know why when I logon, conky opens in it's own window and covers whatever toolbars and panels happen to be under it?  I switched own_window to "no" in the config, and then it doesn't load at all at logon.  I have to open it manually to get it to work right
wat command are u autostarting conky with?
in the sessions thing I added "conky" to startup
Wel probably wont make anydiffernce but try it wit /usr/bin/conky its wat i hav and mine works perfectly
